EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to notify the Customer when the onboard with driver event message is created for an international item
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW Onboard with driver international
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your item {!Case.ReferenceID__c} is due for delivery today to your addressee
If your addressee is not home or if the item is unable to be delivered it will be sent to the local collection office.
If your addressee does not receive the item today, they can contact their local post office. Our International Post Guide has links to destination post offices and tracking information; just select a country and scroll to the bottom.
If you have any further questions around the delivery of your item, please reply to this email and we will be happy to assist you.
Thank you,
Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
